item.title: BlowWar AI Projet
item.author: Author
item.description: The game Blobwar is played on an 8x8 chessboard where two players (blue and red) compete. Each player has a set of pieces called blobs. The game is played turn by turn. Each turn, whenever possible, the current player chooses a blob and moves it. Any move to an adjacent square (including diagonally) sees the blob duplicated on the target square. It is also possible to jump to a distance of 2 squares, but in this case the blob moves from the starting square to the target square (so there is no duplication).

item.title: Challenge Neovision x Ens'IA 2022
item.author: Author
item.description: What is this challenge about? This is an artificial intelligence challenge organized jointly by Neovision and Ens’IA. For the second edition of this challenge, participants had to create an AI, but don’t panic: Neovision coaches will were there to accompany them. There were also workshops to give them additional knowledge! This challenge were for participants the opportunity to live a real AI project and to deepen their knowledge, but also and above all to have fun and to meet people

item.title: Ens'IA association
item.author: Author
item.description: What is Ens’IA Ens’IA is a french AI association aiming to : Promote AI and its applications Organize with partners, companies or other student associations events and activities such as conferences, lectures, training workshops, collaborative workshops, professional-student meetings, etc. Organize AI competitions and challenges in France Promoting ethical and responsible AI You can find the free courses we offer on our github page My work at Ens’IA I am taking part in the sessions Ens’IA offers: I am one of the two person giving the lecture.

item.title: Virtual Drag and Drop using hand
item.author: Author
item.description: VirtualDragAndDrop I was kind of bored a week end so I wanted to do something that will be absolutely never used again 🙃. This little project allowed me to get in touch with OpenCV and image processing. The program I built creates a virtual drag and drop on objects represented by their centers. I used rectangle for this example. To use the program, just run the file main.py. Then to move an object, you have to “grab it” = close your hand when your hand is on the object.

item.title: Challenge DATA & AI by Ens'IA and Neovision
item.author: Author
item.description: The challenge: This challenge was organized by Ens’IA and Neovision in 2021. It lasted a month and a half and was about the well known subject of Optical Character Recognition (OCR). What is OCR ? It’s about converting images of typed, handwritten or printed text into machine-encoded text. Learn more ➡️ The goal was quite simple but still very challenging: building the best model to recognize the characters in the dataset given by Neovision.
